Student_Sponsor_Contract_Data.description: Student Impact Options Data

validation.validation: You can't change the value of the No FA Need Impact field because the sponsor contract has 1 or more lines where disbursements don't add up to zero, non-canceled invoices exist, pending or approved disbursements for refunds exist, or non-canceled refund recovery charges from the disbursement payment for the line exists. To change the value of the field, make sure each line's disbursements add up to zero and cancel any existing invoices, refunds, or refund recovery charges.

Student_Sponsor_Contract_Line_Data.description: Academic Period Reference for Student Sponsor Contract Line Data Element

validation.validation:
Submit an academic period:
- Where the student's primary program of study has one of these statuses as of the standard start date: In Progress, Leave of Absence, or Pending Completion.
- That falls within the award year.
- Where the primary program of study of the student's reporting record hasn't changed to a program of study that uses a different academic calendar.
- For which the student has an active financial aid period record on their attendance plan.

validation.validation: You can't change the student or academic period of an existing contract line. If the contract line isn't invoiced or disbursed yet, you can delete it by accessing the related actions menu of a student sponsor contract and selecting Student Sponsor Contract > Edit.

You can't delete an existing student sponsor contract line that has been invoiced or disbursed. Clear the Delete field or remove the student sponsor contract line from the operation.
